entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is VeloBot. How can I help you today?

Look, I don't have time for this robot nonsense. I need to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a couple of weeks ago and it's just not working out for me. It's uncomfortable and the readings are all over the place. I want my money back.

Thank you for calling VeloFit. My name is Alex, and I'd be happy to assist you with your return. I understand you'd like to return a VeloBand Pulse that you recently purchased. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Ugh, fine. It's order number #VF12345. Hurry this up, please. I'm on a tight schedule.
Thank you, I have located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [Date 15 days prior]. To confirm, you are looking to initiate a return, correct?
Yes! That's what I've been saying! Is that a problem? I checked the return policy and I'm pretty sure I'm still within the window.

Not a problem at all! At VeloFit, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Our return policy allows for returns up to 90 days after purchase. The VeloBand Pulse is definitely covered under this policy.
90 days? Really? I thought I only had a week or so. Well, that's a relief. So, what do I need to do?

The return process is very simple. I will email you a prepaid shipping label. Once you receive the label, please package the VeloBand Pulse securely, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we will process your refund.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. Will I get a full refund?
Yes, you will receive a full refund for the price of the VeloBand Pulse, excluding any shipping fees that may have applied to the original purchase.
Great! When will I get the label?
I'm generating the label now. You should receive it in your email within the next few minutes. If you don’t see it, please check your spam folder. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thank you for your help. You've been much more efficient than that robot at the beginning.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business at VeloFit. Have a great day!
